summary: Shortly after a giant robot destroys a village, aliens from outer space arrive offering friendship. Will the people of Earth tie these two events together?
cast: Kenji Sahara|Yumi Shirakawa|Momoko Kôchi|Akihiko Hirata|Takashi Shimura|Susumu Fujita|Hisaya Itô|Yoshio Kosugi|Fuyuki Murakami|Yoshio Tsuchiya|Minosuke Yamada|Tetsu Nakamura|Heihachirô Ôkawa|Takeo Oikawa|Haruya Katô|Senkichi Ômura|Harold Conway|Yutaka Sada|Hideo Mihara|Rikie Sanjô|Sôji Ubukata|Mitsuo Tsuda|Ren Imaizumi|Shin Ôtomo|Takuzô Kumagai|Akio Kusama|Shôichi Hirose|Tadao Nakamaru|Kamayuki Tsubono|Rinsaku Ogata|Yasuhiro Shigenobu|George Furness|Byron Morrow|Haruo Nakajima|Katsumi Tezuka|Hideo Unagami|Enver Altenbay|Ryûtarô Amami|Saburô Kadowaki|Keiichirô Katsumoto|Masayoshi Kawabe|Mitsuo Matsumoto|Jirô Mitsuaki|Eisuke Nakanishi
keywords: running for one's life|army|helicopter|psychotronic film|giant robot
title: Los Misterianos
